sentences.en: Exomologesis was a ritual of recognizing oneself as a sinner and a penitent.
sentences.cn: 告解庭是一种仪式,承认自己是原罪违犯者及忏悔者.

sentences.en: First, you were penitent for four to ten years, and this status affected your life.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你从事忏悔,四到十年, 这个地位影响你的一生.

sentences.en: In such frame of mind sinners come to the penitent form.
sentences.cn: 罪人们就是怀着这种心请坐到忏悔的长凳上去的.

sentences.en: Recognition also designates the entire process that the penitent experiences in this status over the years.
sentences.cn: 认罪也指明悔罪者在过去几年来,在这个地位所经验的整个过程.

sentences.en: Robert Gates sat before them, almost penitent about the past.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·盖茨坐在他们面前，对过去的事几乎无颜以对。

sentences.en: The penitent boy turned his back on the unhappy past and began a new existence.
sentences.cn: 那悔过的男孩抛弃了不愉快的过去,开始了新生.

sentences.en: Those who were penitent obtained absolution.
To be forgiven for committing a mortal sin, one must be extremely penitent.
sentences.cn: 为了要得到宽恕,犯下这些罪的人必须有很大的耐心.

sentences.en: When he realized the enormity of his crime, he became remorseful and penitent.
sentences.cn: 当他意识到的巨大他的罪行, 他悔恨和忏悔.

trans.tran_en: feeling sorry because you have done something wrong, and are intending not to do it again
